name: IMDB Full-Screen
description: Enjoy the IMDB website in full-resolution HD and full-screen.  This theme supports any screen size, so it will look good on any size of screen, whether big or ginormous.
additional_info:
Version 1.0.2

- Fix carousel not taking full-screen

Version 1.0.1

- Fix homepage not full-screen

Version 1.0.0

- Basic override using flexbox
- Re-adjust absolutely-positioned banners
